message.raw:
bed.get_trackline_and_reader: handle missing tracklines
_util.maybe_gzip_open: allow "-" as a filename
segway-layer: add a default trackline, allow non-integer names, allow I/O from stdin/stdout
task: add docs
setup: switch from path.py to forked-path
